snippet: Exports rose 1.1 percent in March, but a poll showed that sentiment remained negative among manufacturers, with many yet to see sizable increases in orders or demand.
lead_paragraph: Exports rose 1.1 percent in March, but a poll showed that sentiment remained negative among manufacturers, with many yet to see sizable increases in orders or demand.

headline.seo: Japan’s Annual Trade Deficit Surges, Hit by Energy Needs
headline.main: Japanese Exports Rise, but Demand for Goods Is Lackluster
headline.print_headline: Japan’s Annual Trade Deficit Surges, Hit by Energy Needs
